initialProducts.name: Immune Boost Pro
initialProducts.description: Advanced formula to strengthen your immune system with natural ingredients.
benefits: Clinically proven to reduce sick days by 40%

medicalInfo.contraindications: Not recommended for individuals with autoimmune disorders without medical supervision
medicalInfo.storage: Store at room temperature, away from direct sunlight

initialProducts.name: Joint Relief Max
initialProducts.description: Premium joint support with glucosamine, chondroitin, and MSM for optimal mobility.
benefits: Shown to improve joint mobility by 35% in clinical trials
initialProducts.dosage: Take 2 capsules daily, preferably with meals

medicalInfo.contraindications: Not suitable for individuals with shellfish allergies
medicalInfo.storage: Store in a cool, dry place

initialProducts.name: Cardio Vital
initialProducts.description: Heart health supplement with omega-3s, CoQ10, and plant sterols.
benefits: Clinically shown to reduce LDL cholesterol by 18%
initialProducts.dosage: Take 1 softgel twice daily with meals

medicalInfo.contraindications: Not recommended before surgery due to potential bleeding risk
medicalInfo.interactions: May interact with blood pressure medications

initialProducts.name: Neuro Focus
initialProducts.description: Cognitive enhancement formula with nootropics and brain-boosting nutrients.
benefits: Shown to improve cognitive performance by 25% in clinical studies

medicalInfo.contraindications: Not recommended for individuals with bipolar disorder

about.title: About Test Medic Web - Usama
about.description: Founded with a mission to bring the highest quality medical supplements to the market, Test Medic Web - Usama partners with world-class manufacturers to import scientifically validated health products.
points: Rigorous quality control at every production stage
Clinically proven ingredients at effective dosages

science.title: The Science Behind Our Products
science.description: Our supplements are developed based on the latest scientific research and formulated by medical experts to ensure efficacy and safety.

cards.title: Evidence-Based Formulations
cards.description: Each ingredient is selected based on peer-reviewed clinical studies demonstrating its effectiveness for the intended health benefit.

cards.title: Quality Assurance
cards.description: Rigorous testing for purity, potency, and absence of contaminants ensures you receive exactly what's on the label.

cards.title: Optimal Bioavailability
cards.description: We use advanced delivery systems to enhance absorption and ensure your body can utilize the nutrients effectively.

contact.title: Get In Touch
